sponsors.name: Washakie Museum
sponsors.description: The museum has been the host organization for the Robotics team since we started. It is a good relationship for both of us as we help get people in their doors, and they help us with their non-profit status

sponsors.name: Cloud Peak Chiropractic & Wellness
sponsors.description: Cloud Peak Chiropractic has also been a major sponser of ours, as they have donated a lot over the years and have helped us purchase micellaneus parts. We used to hold our meetings in their yoga studio.

sponsors.name: Worland Kiwanis
sponsors.description: The local Kiwanis club is a significant sponser of our team. They have donated several thousand dollars to the team over the 4 years we have been active.

sponsors.name: Worland Rotary
sponsors.description: Rotary was a major sponser, giving us 2,000 dollars this year to help support our efforts and team goals.

sponsors.name: Range Telephone
sponsors.description: Range Telephone is another major sponser of the team. This year we are using a room in their basement as our meeting space. They have donated mioney to help purchase parts and tools, they also purchased the team's sweatshirts and T-shirts

sponsors.name: Newell Sargent Foundation
sponsors.description: The Newell Sargent Foundation is also a big sponser of our team over the course of the last few years they have donated about 2,000 dollars.
